title: North East Line service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: NEL service has resumed at 12.56 pm. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL svc is delayed due to a Signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 5 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
NEL svc is delayed due to a Signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
